section.title: Description
section.p: "Identifies the co-existing agent contributing to the DUR event (drug or disease conflicting with the prescribed drug or prompting pharmacist professional service)." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 476-H6, Data Dictionary 201104).
"Identifies the co-existing agent contributing to the DUR event (drug or disease) conflicting with the prescribed drug." - NCPDP Script (Field 7883, Data Dictionary 201104)

stentry.p: "Identifies the co-existing agent contributing to the DUR event (drug or disease conflicting with the prescribed drug or prompting pharmacist professional service)." - NCPDP Telecommunication (Field 476-H6, Data Dictionary 201104).
"Identifies the co-existing agent contributing to the DUR event (drug or disease) conflicting with the prescribed drug." - NCPDP Script (Field 7883, Data Dictionary 201104)
